scripts.release: pnpm release:version && pnpm release:build && pnpm standard-version -a
scripts.release:alpha: pnpm release:version --preid alpha && pnpm release:build && pnpm standard-version -a --prerelease alpha --skip.changelog
scripts.release:beta: pnpm release:version --preid beta && pnpm release:build && pnpm standard-version -a --prerelease beta --skip.changelog
scripts.release:publish: pnpm release:publish:build && pnpm -r publish --access public --no-git-checks --tag latest && pnpm release:clean
scripts.release:publish:alpha: pnpm release:publish:build && pnpm -r publish --access public --no-git-checks --tag alpha && pnpm release:clean
scripts.release:publish:beta: pnpm release:publish:build && pnpm -r publish --access public --no-git-checks --tag beta && pnpm release:clean
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm check && pnpm check:types && pnpm check:circular-deps
